entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023
